ValidationRule.description: If Material coverage % is specified, duration and unit of time should be specified too.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT ISNULL(Material_Covered__c), OR( ISNULL( Duration_of_Material_Coverage__c ), ISPICKVAL( Unit_of_Time_Material__c, "")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify the duration and unit of time of Material coverage.
